lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This would have the effect of lowering the world price, maintaining domestic support levels and reducing the government's soybean inventory.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Leaders of the American Soybean Association and the National Soybean Processors Association offered specific loan options to USDA Secretary Lyng in last week's meeting, but participants would not reveal what those options were.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A high-level meeting last week which included the Secretary of Agriculture and other senior USDA officials, along with leaders of the major soybean lobbying groups, failed to reach any decision on what should be done about the soybean loan level, participants at the meeting told Reuters.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: This would have the effect of lowering the world price, maintaining domestic support levels and reducing the government's soybean inventory.
